title: 과거완료진행형 (계속)
intent: 과거 특정 시점까지 계속되던 동작이나 상태를 과거완료진행형으로 표현한다.
lexset: for, since, how long, until, by the time, still, working, studying, waiting, living

seeds.kr: 그가 올 때까지 2시간 동안 기다리고 있었어요.
seeds.en: I had been waiting for two hours when he came.
They had been living there for ten years.
I had been preparing for an hour before the meeting.
How long had you been studying English?
It had been raining since morning.

seeds.kr: 그녀는 3년 동안 그 회사에서 일하고 있었어요.
seeds.en: She had been working at that company for three years.
We had been meeting until lunch time.

seeds.kr: 그들은 왜 그렇게 오래 기다리고 있었나요?
seeds.en: Why had they been waiting so long?
He had been exercising since morning.

seeds.kr: 우리는 1주일 동안 그 문제를 논의하고 있었습니다.
seeds.en: We had been discussing the issue for a week.
